alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 6:23AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. Sweetwater Creek at Brownsville at Powder Springs affecting Paulding and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Brownsville at Powder Springs. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands...fields and pastures of the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Brownsville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM EST Wednesday was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.7 feet on 12/31/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued at 300 PM EST.this evening at 630 PM EST.
